variables.name: startChar
variables.comment: * The offset of the start character which applys this style

variables.name: endChar
variables.comment: * The offset of the end character which applys this style

variables.name: fontID
variables.comment:
* ID of the font. This ID will be used to choose the font
         * to be used from the font list.

variables.name: isBold
variables.comment: * True if the characters should be bold

variables.name: isItalic
variables.comment: * True if the characters should be italic

variables.name: isUnderlined
variables.comment: * True if the characters should be underlined

variables.name: colorRGBA
variables.comment:
* To specify the RGBA color: 8 bits each of red, green, blue,
         * and an alpha(transparency) value
